qas.question: How many people were single in Bern in 2000?
How many people were married in Bern in 2000?
How many people were widows or widowers in Bern in 2000?
Where there more married or single people in Bern in 2000?

context: As of 2000[update], there were <a0_0>59,948<a0_0/> people who were <a3_0>single<a3_0/> and never married in the municipality. There were <a1_0>49,873<a1_0/> married individuals, 9,345 widows or widowers and <a2_0>9,468<a2_0/> individuals who are divorced.
